mapper.select:
SELECT a.arSeq, a.arTitle, a.arContent, a.arDelNy, a.arRegDate, a.arModDate, a.staffMember_sfSeq, b.sfSeq, b.sfName, b.sfTel, b.sfEmail, b.sfDept, c.rcSeq, c.rcType, c.rcTitle, c.rcContent, c.rcStatus, c.userMember_umSeq
ORDER BY a.arRegDate DESC

SELECT a.arSeq, a.arTitle, a.arContent, a.arDelNy, a.arRegDate, a.arModDate, a.staffMember_sfSeq, b.sfName, b.sfDept, b.sfEmail, b.sfTel, c.rcSeq, c.rcType, c.rcTitle, c.rcContent, c.rcStatus, d.umName FROM afterReport a LEFT JOIN staffMember b ON b.sfSeq = a.staffMember_sfSeq LEFT JOIN reception c ON c.rcSeq = a.reception_rcSeq LEFT JOIN userMember d ON d.umSeq = c.userMember_umSeq WHERE a.arSeq = #{arSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO afterReport ( arTitle, arContent, arDelNy, arRegDate, arModDate, staffMember_sfSeq, reception_rcSeq ) VALUES ( #{arTitle}, #{arContent}, 0, NOW(), NOW(), #{staffMember_sfSeq}, #{reception_rcSeq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE afterReport SET arTitle = #{arTitle}, arContent = #{arContent}, arModDate = NOW() WHERE arSeq = #{arSeq}
UPDATE afterReport SET arDelNy = 1 WHERE arSeq = #{arSeq}
